Sush is a tiny utility app, which allows you to \'flip your phone and put it into vibrate\'

It essentially helps you to quickly turn your phone face-down and put it into vibrate. For instance, you are in a meeting, having lunch peacefully, studying at a library, attending a prayer at a temple, mosque or church, where a sudden phone call might startle you.

With this app you can have phone on ringer all the time, but at the same time, allows you the freedom to put it to vibrate upon an incoming call that you didn\'t intend to receive at that moment. This feature might be already available on some of the phones, but most of them allows only to mute to silent by flipping. And also there are some in which this feature is not at all available.

Whats new !
Now, with version 2 you can set a quick response SMS, which will be sent upon flipping the phone to vibrate to the caller, whose call you cannot receive at the moment.

Don\'t forget to share, rate and review this app!
